# bitrise_app (Resource)

Example resource

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "bitrise_app" "example_app" {
  repo                = "github"
  is_public           = false
  organization_slug   = "your-organization-slug"
  repo_url            = "your-repo-url"
  type                = "git"
  git_repo_slug       = "your-git-repo-slug"
  git_owner           = "your-git-owner"
  note                = "Optional note for the app"
}
<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `repo` (String) The repository type (e.g., "github").
- `is_public` (Bool) Whether the app is public.
- `organization_slug` (String) The organization slug.
- `repo_url` (String) The repository URL.
- `type` (String) The repository type.
- `git_repo_slug` (String) The repository slug.
- `git_owner` (String) The owner of the repository.

### Optional

- `note` (String) A note for the app.

### Computed

- `app_slug` (String) The unique identifier for the app.
